name: SpaceRagers
description:
"In the Darkest Depths of the Chardone Galaxy, rubberneckers gazed upon a space crash so horrid not even a Boxtrar Amoeba would survive.

Metal shards floated aimlessly.

Sirens rang.

Obscenities were hurled.

Thus the greatest intergalactic traffic brawl ensued."

SpaceRagers is a two player boxing game where cosmic puppets pummel one another to settle the dispute of a multi-spaceship pile up. Each puppet has a series of sensors which trigger facial deterioration. After 3 rounds, the victor is decided by whoever has managed to cause the most damage or who has knocked their opponent's face off.

CONTROLS

SNAGGLE DADDY - ARROW KEYS

SPEDUSA - W A S D

Note: Whilst this game can be played with a keyboard, that's boring!

Make your own puppets and play it with those!

WHAT OFF EARTH IS HAPPENING?

GAME

CONTROLLER

Built in two weeks for fun by:

FUNKTOVEN & THE MAKERS ARE:

Alex Borovski - Puppet Design and Production

Tyler Giordano - In Game Visuals

Alex Johansson - Game Programming

Featuring the Music of:

Will Bedford - Music Production
